column4: Im configuring a new Ubuntu Server, what should i do with the field [Sysetem mail name] ? It's asked when i'm configuring [Postfix Configuration] ? Should i write localhost or gmail.com ?
Or at least, only the domain.
It's gonna be a local server. Can i use whatever i want then ?
How do i make de key working ?
You didn't tell what problem you have.
looks like the key isn't working, or the server is down..
Anyway, sudo apt-key adv --keyserver pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys the-keyid-you-need

On this page : https://launchpad.net/~deluge-team/+archive/ppa when you hit  technical detail about this PPA, you find a signin key, but it does not work. I wrote : sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 249AD24C
Yeah, it's down... Use pool.sks-keyservers.net or keyserver.noreply.org
llutz : Thnaks for that ;) Now is, which one am i going the chance to be my reader ;)
llutz : Are those programs also the best way to download files from the newsreader ?
I never downloaded anything from Usenet, so can't answer that...
